column1: * 1971 - J.R.R. Tolkien receives a letter from William Cater (see Letter 330).
* 1976 - Letters from Father Christmas is published in the US.
* 2005 - The Lord of the Rings Sketchbook is published.

column4: is announced for publication on 4 May 2017.

column3: travels to Gondolin in order to deliver Ulmos message to Turgon.

column1: ** Glorfindel hurries Aragorn and the Travellers along and they cover a great distance towards the Ford of Bruinen.
